title: Sliding Doors

synopses.large: Romantic comedy. Helen is about to discover that fate can be sealed as quickly as a pair of sliding doors. There are two sides to every story, and Helen is about to live them. Romance has never been quite so duplicitous...
synopses.small: Gwyneth Paltrow in a romantic comedy about being in the right place at the right time.
synopses.medium: Romantic comedy exploring the nature of fate and self-determination in which a young woman's future is affected by a two-second delay. Starring Gwyneth Paltrow.
synopses.editorial: A woman discovers the precarious nature of love as her fate hinges on catching a train.

editorial_subtitle: Romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow and John Hannah

title: Selma

synopses.large: The film chronicles the tumultuous three-month period in 1965 when Dr Martin Luther King Jr led a campaign to secure equal voting rights in the face of violent opposition. Culminating in the epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, which led President Johnson to sign the Voting Rights Act of 1965, one of the most significant victories for the civil rights movement that forever altered history.
synopses.small: David Oyelowo stars as Martin Luther King Jr, chronicling his campaign for equal rights.
synopses.medium: Biopic chronicling the three-month period in 1965 which saw Dr Martin Luther King Jr lead a turbulent march from Selma to Montgomery in a bid to secure equal voting rights.
synopses.editorial: Biopic. In 1965, facing violent protests, Martin Luther King led the equal rights fight.

text.large: Contains some strong language and some violent scenes.
text.medium: Contains some strong language and some violence.

text.large: Contains some strong language and some violent scenes.
text.medium: Contains some strong language and some violence.

editorial_subtitle: He had a dream. He marched to make it reality

title: Mrs Mandela

synopses.large:
Fact-based drama which charts how Winnie Mandela went from innocent country girl to politicised fighter against apartheid, and from an adoring and loving wife to firebrand revolutionary.

In February 1990, Winnie Mandela arrived at Victor Verster prison for the release of her husband Nelson after 27 years' incarceration, a moment of freedom that will be etched on the minds of billions around the world.  

But behind her public face of triumphant celebration lay an inner turmoil, based on the realisation that she could no longer play the loyal and faithful wife.

After following Winnie through her years of imprisonment, torture and exile at the hands of the white ruling class, the film comes to a dramatic crescendo as the consequences of her brutalisation by the South African state blur into the madness of the last days of apartheid. 

We are left with what this all means for one of the most famous couples in the world - Nelson and Mrs Mandela.
synopses.small: How Winnie Mandela went from innocent country girl to a fighter against apartheid.
synopses.medium: Drama which charts how Winnie Mandela (Sophie Okonedo) went from innocent country girl to fighter against apartheid, and from an adoring wife to a firebrand revolutionary.

editorial_subtitle: Sophie Okonedo stars as the controversial South African icon

title: Testament of Youth

synopses.large: In 1914, despite her father's opposition, Vera Brittain is determined to attempt the entrance examination for Sommerville College Oxford to pursue her literary dreams. Her brother Edward supports her plan, as does his good friend Roland who shares Vera's passion for poetry. Hiding their love from their families, Vera and Roland's plans of a future together is cruelly frustrated by the declaration of the First World War. When the young men sign up for duty, Vera cannot sit idly by and volunteers as a nurse.
synopses.small: Vera Brittain's plans change with the declaration of the First World War.
synopses.medium: First World War drama. In 1914, Vera Brittain decides to study at Oxford university. She falls in love with her brother's friend, but then war is declared.
synopses.editorial: Vera Brittain falls in love with a friend, but the outbreak of war changes everything.

text.large: Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.
Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.

editorial_subtitle: Alicia Vikander and Kit Harington star in a WWI drama

title: Madagascar

synopses.large:
Animated comedy. Four pampered animals from New York Central Zoo escape in search of their friend. However, they find themselves en route to Madagascar, where they will be forced to fend for themselves.

Featuring the voices of Ben Stiller (Alex), Chris Rock (Marty), David Schwimmer (Melman), Jada Pinkett Smith (Gloria), Sacha Baron Cohen (Julien) and Cedric the Entertainer (Maurice).
synopses.small: Four animals from the New York Zoo find themselves stranded in the Madagascan jungle.
synopses.medium: Animated comedy about four spoilt animals from New York's Central Park Zoo whose botched escape attempt finds them stranded in the Madagascan jungle.
synopses.editorial: Four pampered animals from New York Central Zoo escape in search of their friend.

editorial_subtitle: Starring Ben Stiller, Chris Rock and Jada Pinkett Smith

title: Spooks: The Greater Good

synopses.large: When a terrorist escapes custody during a routine handover, Will Holloway must team up with disgraced MI5 intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London.
synopses.small: An intelligence chief teams up with a former agent to track down an escaped terrorist.
synopses.medium: Action thriller that sees a disgraced intelligence chief team up with a former agent when a terrorist escapes from custody.
synopses.editorial: When a terrorist escapes custody, London is in grave danger. Starring Kit Harrington.

text.large: Contains some strong language and some violent scenes.
text.medium: Contains some strong language and some violence.

text.large: Contains some strong language and some violent scenes.
text.medium: Contains some strong language and some violence.

editorial_subtitle: Harry Pearce is back – and facing his biggest challenge yet

title: Life of Crime

synopses.large: The wife of a corrupt real-estate developer is kidnapped by two criminals who want inside information about his crooked business and offshore accounts. But the husband decides he'd rather not get his wife back.
synopses.small: Comedy drama with Jennifer Aniston as the kidnapped wife of a real-estate developer.
synopses.medium: Comedy. The wife of a corrupt real-estate developer is kidnapped by two criminals who want inside information about his business. But the husband doesn't want his wife back.
synopses.editorial: The wife of a corrupt property developer is kidnapped. But he doesn't want her back.

editorial_subtitle: Comedy drama starring Jennifer Aniston as a conman's wife

title: Buena Vista Social Club

synopses.large:
Cuba's rich and colourful past comes vividly to life in this legendary, Oscar-nominated documentary.

The award-winning Buena Vista Social Club album produced by Ry Cooder remains the biggest-selling world music album ever, showcasing the talents of a dream team of veterans from Cuban music's golden age, including Ibrahim Ferrer, Ruben Gonzalez, Eliades Ochoa, Omara Portuondo and Compay Segundo.

Never a regular band, The Buena Vista Social Club had gone their separate ways, but in this extraordinary film Wim Wenders intimately documents Ry Cooder's return to Havana, encountering these musical legends again as they look back to the halcyon days of Cuba's music scene, when the rich and famous travelled from all over the world to listen to them. In the climax, their music comes alive once again, as they rehearse for their first - and only - performance in America, at New York's Carnegie Hall.
synopses.small: A group of Cuban musicians are brought together by Ry Cooder to record their music.
synopses.medium: Documentary about a group of legendary Cuban musicians who were brought together by Ry Cooder to record their music. Includes recording sessions in Havana and concert footage.
synopses.editorial: How Ry Cooder reunited a group of legendary Cuban musicians for a spectacular peformance.

related_links.title: BBC Music: Buena Vista Social Club

editorial_subtitle: Cuba's musical past comes to life in a classic documentary

title: The Homesman

synopses.large: The stark life for Nebraska Territory settlers has unhinged three women who wilful Mary Bee Cuddy is tasked with transporting east to safety in Iowa. She must grudgingly draft disreputable drifter George Briggs to share the stress and responsibility of the five-week odyssey over hostile plains.
synopses.small: Hilary Swank and Tommy Lee Jones star in this characterful western drama.
synopses.medium: Western drama. A frontier farmer saves the life of a claim jumper and persuades him to help her escort three women who have suffered breakdowns to a safe haven in Iowa.
synopses.editorial: Western drama. A farmer and a claim jumper must transport three insane women to a safety.

text.large: Contains some scenes of a sexual nature.

editorial_subtitle: A mission of mercy with Hilary Swank and Tommy Lee Jones

title: Bringing Up Baby

synopses.large: Classic screwball comedy about a madcap heiress who makes a shambles of an absent-minded palaeontologist's life when she arrives on the scene complete with her pet leopard. The film's rollercoaster plot formed the basis for 1972's What's Up, Doc? and is notable for Katharine Hepburn's foray into zany comedy.
synopses.small: A madcap heiress (Katherine Hepburn) meets an absent-minded palaeontologist (Cary Grant).
synopses.medium: Classic comedy about a madcap heiress (Katharine Hepburn) who makes a shambles of an absent-minded palaeontologist's life when she arrives on the scene with her pet leopard.
synopses.editorial: A madcap heiress – and her leopard – crash into the life of a mild-mannered doctor.

editorial_subtitle: The screwball classic with Cary Grant and Katharine Hepburn

title: The Silent Child

synopses.large: Busy parents Sue and Paul decide to get help from social worker Joanne to prepare their youngest daughter Libby, who is deaf, for the big step of going to school for the first time. Joanne and Libby bond almost immediately, with Joanne beginning to teach a responsive Libby British Sign Language, but Sue is concerned that Libby focuses on lip reading.
synopses.small: Sue and Paul decide to get a social worker to prepare their deaf daughter for school.
synopses.medium: Oscar-winning short film. Busy parents Sue and Paul decide to get help from social worker Joanne to prepare their youngest daughter Libby, who is deaf, for school.
synopses.editorial: Going to school is a big step for anyone – but for Libby, there’s an added complication.

editorial_subtitle: The Oscar-winning story of a girl finding her voice

synopses.large:
When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets more fun than he bargained for. A mix-up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead Shaun and the flock to the big city, and it is up to Shaun to return everyone to the green green grass of home.

Featuring the voices of Justin Fletcher (Shaun/Timmy), John Sparkes (Farmer/Bitzer), Omid Djalili(Trumper), Richard Webber (Shirley), Kate Harbour (Timmy's mum/Meryl), Tim Hands (Slip), Andy Nyman (Nuts), Simon Greenall (Twins) and Emma Tate (Hazel).
synopses.small: Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun but he gets more than he bargained for
synopses.medium: Animation. The rebellious sheep Shaun, who always seems to get in trouble, decides to take a trip to the big city.
synopses.editorial: When Shaun decides to take the day off for some fun, he gets more than he bargained for.

title: Hamlet

synopses.large:
Hamlet captures the Almeida Theatre's 2017 acclaimed production of William Shakespeare's great play, recorded as-live in its West End transfer on the stage of London's Harold Pinter Theatre.

Robert Icke's innovative modern-dress production, featuring Andrew Scott, Juliet Stevenson, Angus Wright and Jessica Brown Findlay, has been widely acclaimed as a dazzlingly intelligent, forcefully contemporary staging. The Evening Standard hailed Andrew Scott's 'career-defining performance... he makes the most famous speeches feel fresh and unpredictable.'

The recording features the original cast, and is directed for the screen by Rhodri Huw, working in close collaboration with Robert Icke. Hamlet has design by Hildegard Bechtler, with lighting by Natasha Chivers, sound by Tom Gibbons, and video design by Tal Yarden. The stage production has been nominated for Best Revival, Andrew Scott as Best Actor and Tom Gibbons has been nominated for Best Sound Design in the forthcoming Olivier Awards. The production recently won Best Stage Revival in the WhatsOnStage Awards, and Juliet Stevenson won Best Supporting Actress in a Play whilst Andrew Scott won the Critics' Circle Theatre Award for Best Shakespearean Performance. Hamlet is is an Illuminations/Almeida Theatre production presented by BBC, The Almeida Theatre, The Ambassador Theatre Group, Sonia Friedman Productions.
synopses.small: Almeida Theatre's 2017 production of Shakespeare's play, recorded as-live in the West End.
synopses.medium: Hamlet captures the Almeida Theatre's 2017 acclaimed production of Shakespeare's great play, recorded as-live in the West End.
synopses.editorial: The Almeida Theatre’s dazzling modern-dress production, recorded on the West End stage.

editorial_subtitle: Andrew Scott stars in an innovative, acclaimed production

title: Black Narcissus

synopses.large: Emotionally charged drama about a group of nuns at a Himalayan outpost who try to maintain a school and hospital despite formidable odds and the emergence of deeply repressed passions. Cinematographer Jack Cardiff and art director Alfred Junge won Academy Awards.
synopses.small: Five nuns at a Himalayan outpost try to maintain a school and hospital. With Deborah Kerr.
synopses.medium: Oscar-winning, emotionally charged drama about a group of nuns at a Himalayan outpost who try to maintain a school and a hospital against formidable odds.
synopses.editorial: Five nuns at a Himalayan outpost try to maintain a school, against all the odds.

editorial_subtitle: Deborah Kerr stars in an emotional, Oscar-winning drama

title: Jimi: All Is by My Side

synopses.large: Biopic of Jimi Hendrix, from his discovery by Linda Keith working in other people's bands in New York, through his meeting with manager Chas Chandler and explosion onto the London scene, and to his emergence as the greatest and most exciting rock musician of the 1960s.
synopses.small: Andre Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this biopic about the rock star's early years.
synopses.medium: Biopic about rock star Jimi Hendrix's early years in 1966 and 1967, between the Cheetah Club in New York and London, until his triumph in Monterey.
synopses.editorial: From his discovery by Linda Keith through to his explosion onto the London scene.

original_title: Jimi: All Is by My Side
editorial_subtitle: Discover the early career of the 60s rock legend

title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

synopses.large: Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. Leaving behind her life of luxury, the highly-trained adventurer travels to exotic and dangerous locales, where she battles a variety of fantastical creatures in the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands.
synopses.small: The heroine races against time to find a relic before it falls into the wrong hands.
synopses.medium: Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine (Angelina Jolie) races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands.
synopses.editorial: The fate of mankind rests in her hands. Swashbuckling adventure starring Angelina Jolie.

text.large: Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.

editorial_subtitle: The daredevil heroine races against time to locate a relic

title: Wallace and Gromit: The Wrong Trousers

synopses.large: Oscar-winning animated adventure featuring Wallace and Gromit. The duo are plunged into a hilarious tale of skulduggery involving an extraordinary pair of automated trousers and a villainous penguin. Featuring Peter Sallis as the voice of Wallace.
synopses.small: A mysterious penguin moves in with Wallace and Gromit, embroiling them in a heist.
synopses.medium: Oscar-winning claymation. Wallace and his canine companion Gromit become embroiled in a jewellery heist after a mysterious penguin rents a room in their house.

original_title: Wallace and Gromit: The Wrong Trousers

title: Wallace and Gromit: A Close Shave

synopses.large: Oscar-winning claymation comedy thriller from Nick Park, featuring the popular inventor and his dog. Wallace's whirlwind romance with the proprietor of the local wool shop puts his head in a spin, and Gromit is framed for sheep rustling in a fiendish criminal plot, meeting a sheep named Shaun along the way. Will Wallace snap out of his daze in time to rescue his canine companion?
synopses.small: While Wallace is distracted by a romance, Gromit is framed for sheep rustling.
synopses.medium: Oscar-winning animated comedy thriller. While Wallace is distracted by a romance with the local wool shop owner, Gromit is framed for sheep rustling in a fiendish criminal plot.

original_title: Wallace and Gromit: A Close Shave

title: Mr Blandings Builds His Dream House

synopses.large: A family forced to quit their expensive New York apartment court disaster as they try to fulfil their dream of owning their own house in the country. A sharp estate agent sells them an ancient dilapidated place in Connecticut, which horrified surveyors insist is only fit for demolition.
synopses.small: Comedy starring Cary Grant. A family try to fulfil their dream of owning a country house.
synopses.medium: Comedy starring Cary Grant and Myrna Loy. A family forced out of their Manhattan apartment court disaster when they buy a dilapidated country house, fit only for demolition.
synopses.editorial: A family long for domestic bliss – but their new home is anything but.

original_title: Mr Blandings Builds His Dream House

title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life

synopses.large: Globetrotting action sequel in which intrepid archaeologist Lara Croft is recruited by British intelligence to track down mad bioweapons genius Dr Reiss, who holds the orb showing the whereabouts of the mythical Pandora's Box. When he threatens to unleash a deadly plague contained within it, Lara and her marine turned mercenary partner face a race against time to scupper his evil plan.
synopses.small: Archaeologist Lara Croft faces a race against time to find mad bioweapons genius Dr Reiss.
synopses.medium: Globetrotting action sequel in which archaeologist Lara Croft (Angelina Jolie) must track down a mad bioweapons genius who threatens to unleash a deadly plague from Pandora's Box.
synopses.editorial: Lara’s back - and must track down a mad genius who threatens to unleash a deadly plague.

original_title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
